<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeVectorDistance"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeVectorDistance

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeVectorBase](class_visualshadernodevectorbase.md) **<** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Returns the distance between two points. To be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Calculates distance from point represented by vector ``p0`` to vector ``p1``.

Translated to ``distance(p0, p1)`` in the shader language.
